TopicTitle: A problem I found with a certain mouse.

Articles.Content:
So I use the Logitech M705 Marathon Mouse, and I love it. When I play KSP though, I run into trouble with it sometimes. I find it impossible to zoom in and out in the VAB, zoom in the flight screen, and sometimes, when I use my trackpad on my laptop to zoom, because my mouse can't (MacBook Pro Late 2011), when I go back to using my mouse, I can't pan the view at all (right click + drag).

Now I don't know if it is this mouse causing these problems, or just the game.

Also I play in 1.1

Hi @nickrulercreator, does your mouse wheel allow for sideways scrolling?  If so please try that in case the scrolling is swapped on your mouse, also please try your mouse software settings in case anything there helps with this issue, thank you.
